Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.GameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameState extends Object implements Serializable
Class that describes the state of a specific game

    • GameState

      Class constructor
      Parameters:

      numOfPlayers - number of players for the current game

  • Method Details

    • restoreRemotePlayers

      public void restoreRemotePlayers()
      Method in charge of restoring all remote objects for each player

    • setAllPlayersOffline

      public void setAllPlayersOffline()
      Upon game restoring, all players should be marked as offline initially... This method is in charge of forcing all player connection states to "disconnected"

    • remainingOnline

      public int remainingOnline()
      Method in charge of returning number of currently online players
      Returns:
      number of online players

    • isSuspended

      public boolean isSuspended()
      Getter method for the this.suspended attribute
      Returns:
      this.suspended

    • turnIsOver

      public void turnIsOver()
      Method to be called after the turn of a player has ended. The method is in charge of performing all the required end-of-turn operations

    • terminate

      public void terminate()
      When called, this method will immediately terminate the game. This could be needed in case of long player disconnections...

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      getter function for gameOver attribute
      Returns:
      the gameOver attribute

    • getGameID

      public String getGameID()
      getter method for gameUniqueCode
      Returns:
      the unique game ID of the game

    • getPlayerStatus

      public int[] getPlayerStatus()
      Method in charge of returning the current player status of the game, that is, the number of players this game takes and the number of players which have actually already joined the game
      Returns:
      an array of two ints: players who have already joined, total players of the game

    • getUserByUsername

      public Optional<Player> getUserByUsername(String username)
      Method in charge of looking for, and returning, a Player of the current game given a username
      Parameters:
      username - username to look for
      Returns:
      an optional of Player

    • addNewPlayerToGame

      public void addNewPlayerToGame(Player newPlayer) throws GameAlreadyFullException
      Method in charge of adding a new player to the current game. Some preconditions are that the player has a unique username and that the game can still accept players
      Parameters:
      newPlayer - the player to be added
      Throws:
      GameAlreadyFullException - whenever it is attempted to add a new player, but the game is already full

    • actuallyIsPlayersTurn

      public boolean actuallyIsPlayersTurn(Player player)
      Function in charge of telling the caller if it is a certain player's turn
      Parameters:
      player - player of whom we want to know if it is the turn
      Returns:
      whether it is the passed player's turn

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      getter method for board attribute
      Returns:
      the board associated to this game

    • getSharedGameState

      public SharedGameState getSharedGameState(Player player)
      Method in charge of generating a shared version of the current GameState
      Parameters:
      player - player for whom we want to generate a shared game state
      Returns:
      shared version of the current game state for the requested player

    • obtainedCommons

      public void obtainedCommons(int currPlayerIndex)
      method that checks if a Player has achieved or not any Common Objectives
      Parameters:
      currPlayerIndex - index of player to check for common objectives

    • obtainedCommons

      public void obtainedCommons()
      Shorthand version of the obtainedCommons(int) method which calls the obtainedCommons(int) passing this.currPlayerIndex as argument
